title: Silicon Sage Build Request
description: Input payload for the Desktop PC Builder Multi-Agent System. Defines budget, usage requirements, and aesthetic preferences for internal components (excluding case).

budget_cap.description: The total maximum amount to spend on core components (CPU, GPU, Mobo, RAM, SSD, PSU). Excludes Case/Chassis cost.

flexibility.description: 'strict' means the budget_cap is a hard limit. 'flexible' allows the agent to exceed by ~10% if significant performance gains are found.

build_requirements.description: Technical performance targets based on user activity.

primary_use.description: List of primary activities (e.g., 'Gaming', 'Video Editing', '3D Rendering'). Used to prioritize CPU vs GPU.

target_resolution.description: The monitor resolution the user intends to use. Defaults to 'Unknown' if not specified.

form_factor_target.description: The target motherboard size. Defaults to ATX for standard builds since case selection is excluded.

component_preferences.description: Visual and brand preferences for internal parts.

lighting_style.description: Preference for LED lighting on components like RAM, Fans, and GPU.

color_theme.description: The physical color of the component shrouds/heatsinks.

cpu_preferred_platform.description: Brand loyalty for the CPU platform.

user_prompt.description: Raw natural language input from the user to capture edge cases, specific game titles (e.g. 'GTA 6'), or specific port requirements (e.g. 'need thunderbolt').
